Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That was very helpful. I'll buy ore from
you anytime.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Though keep in mind that I'm often
looking for different ore at
different times.
So check in with me every so often to see
what I'm looking for.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since you're speaking to me again,<sp:5:1:0>
I assume you have ore to sell me?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You again.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You know, it seems most everyone's into
that marbled rock roast and not much
else. Not a great time to procure ore.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sarqso for selling me the amber just now.


Since you're speaking to me again,<sp:5:1:0>
I assume you have ore to sell me?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You won't? Certainly you can sell your
ore at any old shop.

Amber is getting easier to come by, so the
selling price is lower than ever.

I'm the only one who will buy them at a
high price these days.
Talk_36:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c00>*sigh* Figured maybe I could find myself a voe while
I'm getting gems... But I certainly didn't want one
who can't even dress himself properly...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that the marbled rock roast is gone,
the Gorons are back to their usual grind.

I finally feel like I can relax and get the
ore I need for my business.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm...<sp:5:1:0> You're back, so...<sp:5:1:0>you have ore to
sell me,<sp:5:0:0> right?
Talk_37:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Selling to someone from the Yiga Clan isn't my idea
of a fun time... <sp:5:0:0>But money is money, I suppose.<sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CustomSavotta_00>Sav'otta! Oh, <sp:5:1:0>sorry.


"Sav'otta" is an expression where I'm
from. It means good morning.

Although, kids these days shorten it
to "sav'o."
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Got any <clr:0000>topazes<clr:ffff>? I'll buy 10 from you for
<clr:0000>1,000 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CustomSavaaq_00>Sav'aaq! Oh, <sp:5:1:0>sorry.


"Sav'aaq" is an expression where I'm
from. It means good day.

Although, kids these days shorten it
to "sav'a."
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Got any <clr:0000>rubies<clr:ffff>? I'll buy 10 from you for
<clr:0000>1,300 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CustomSavsaaba_00>Sav'saaba! Oh, <sp:5:1:0>sorry.


"Sav'saaba" is an expression where I'm
from. It means good evening.

Although, kids these days shorten it
to "sav'a."
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Got any <clr:0000>sapphires<clr:ffff>? I'll buy 10 from you
for <clr:0000>1,700 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>I'm Ramella. I'm a jeweler from Gerudo
Town in southwestern Hyrule.

The <clr:0000>ore <clr:ffff>that <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>handles are
high quality, so I always travel here to
procure them.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But at the moment, there aren't any
available here.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't suppose...<sp:5:1:0>you have any amber,
do you?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Sarqso! Oh, <sp:5:1:0>sorry.


"Sarqso" is another expression where I'm
from. It means thank you.

Kids these days shorten it to "sarq."
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Got any <clr:0000>diamonds<clr:ffff>? I'll buy 10 from you
for <clr:0000>5,500 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You won't? Certainly you can sell your
ore at any old shop.

Amber is getting easier to come by, so the
selling price is lower than ever.

I'm the only one who puts such a <clr:0000>high
price<clr:ffff> on <clr:0000>amber <clr:ffff>these days.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Looks like you don't have 10 <clr:0000>topaz<clr:ffff>
gems. It's got to be 10 at a time,
otherwise, no deal.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Sorry, but for the <clr:0000>ruby <clr:ffff>gems, I only buy
those in units of 10.

It's got to be 10, otherwise, no deal.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You cannot fool me.


You don't have 10 amber pieces on you.
I can't buy something that isn't there.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Sorry, but for the <clr:0000>sapphire <clr:ffff>gems, I only
buy those in units of 10.

It's got to be 10 at a time, otherwise,
no deal.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh, don't try to fool me.


You don't have 10 <clr:0000>diamonds<clr:ffff>. It's got to
be 10, otherwise, no deal.
